name: Halloween Store Decorator!
description:
Its a week from Halloween and you need to decorate your store! There's no need to worry because you can just buy from the catalog!

Instructions:

To select where you want to put your decorations, use the left and right arrow keys. Then, when you are at the place you want to decorate, hit the space bar. You will then use the left and right arrow keys to cycle through the available things to place. Once you have settled on what you want to choose, hit the enter key to confirm your choice. You will have to buy from the catalog first before you can place anything.

Known Bugs:

After hitting the spacebar to select the decorating location, the right arrow key will send you to the very end of the list no matter where you are on the list. The left arrow key will still give you all the selections.
